sect1.title: Writers
sect1.para: A Writer is an object that inherits from Zend_Log_Writer_Abstract. A Writer's responsibility is to record log data to a storage backend.

sect2.title: Writing to Streams
sect2.para: Zend_Log_Writer_Stream sends log data to a PHP stream.
